entry.content:
Description

What kind of engineering is required to deploy Python applications to enterprise customers with high security requirements? This session examines the characteristics of such enterprise environments and shares how we solved these challenges using standalone builds and pex/scie open source projects. Additionally, we introduce how we developed a TUI installer using the textual library to make complex installation and configuration processes accessible not only to developers but also to partner technical support engineers.
